A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke Skywalker declares\, 'this is not going to go the way you think' and those words encapsulate the roller coaster ride The Last Jedi takes us on! An out-of-the-box Star Wars entry\, which takes the story and characters to new heights\, and sets up a highly anticipated climax! Is it perfect\, no\, but the movie is Epic\, and will leave your head spinning\, by throwing conventional wisdom into the trash compacter\, and heading full-speed into hyperspace!
